channel.title: I need help.... with duping
channel.description:
Hello, my problem is a bad case of dupping. I'm not really sure how I can patch this. So I'll explain how it is done, in full detail. Please help me.
This is just what I've seen.
First step: One person gets what ever items they want to dupe, (Noted form). Second Step: The person find another player to help them out to do it. Third Step: They both go out into the wild and the one with the items skulls on the other. Fourth Step: Then the other person, (the one not skulled) does about 5 damage, (there level 3's with 10 hp). 5th Step: Then they both go some where to hide near a monster (in this case dark beast.) Sixth Step: The one who did not get a skull logs out. Seventh Step: Then the one with the items gets killed by the Dark Beast. loosing the items. 8th Step: The one with no skull logs back in, and find the stuff on the ground. and it's all doubled.
So far All I've done is just disable the wild for now, not really sure what to do, someone help me please!
Thank you!

item.title: I need help.... with duping
item.dc:creator: @ik0u2 ik0u2
item.description:
@ik0u2 wrote:

Hello, my problem is a bad case of dupping. I’m not really sure how I can patch this. So I’ll explain
how it is done, in full detail. Please help me.

This is just what I’ve seen.

First step: One person gets what ever items they want to dupe, (Noted form).
Second Step: The person find another player to help them out to do it.
Third Step: They both go out into the wild and the one with the items skulls on the other.
Fourth Step: Then the other person, (the one not skulled) does about 5 damage, (there level 3’s with 10 hp).
5th Step: Then they both go some where to hide near a monster (in this case dark beast.)
Sixth Step: The one who did not get a skull logs out.
Seventh Step: Then the one with the items gets killed by the Dark Beast. loosing the items.
8th Step: The one with no skull logs back in, and find the stuff on the ground. and it’s all doubled.

So far All I’ve done is just disable the wild for now, not really sure what to do, someone help me please!

Thank you!
